text: Bar guizbangɨra, gumazitam ia gativaghtɨ, ia mati kalabuziar gumazibar mɨn ikiam, o a ian biziba bar da gɨvagham, o a ia gifar ia isɨ uan gavgavimɨn apengan darɨgham, o a uabɨ uabɨ damigh egh gumazir ekiamɨn mɨn ikiam, o a ian tav akar kurabar a damuva, mati a an guam apezegham, eghtɨ gumazir arazir kabar ia gamiba, ia uari men amamangatɨghtɨ, me uari ifongezɨ moghɨn ia damuam.
